message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $13500. This is a great deal, considering the product's value to you is $15000. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.
